terms_intro: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our website.

terms_section1_p2: We reserve the right to update or change these terms at any time.
terms_section1_p3: Continued use of the site after changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.
terms_section2_p1: By using this website, you explicitly accept these terms.
terms_section2_p2: If you do not agree, please do not use our services.
terms_section3_p1: All images, logos, graphics, photos, and texts are our intellectual property and protected by law.
terms_section3_p2: Copying, downloading, or modifying content is strictly prohibited.
terms_section4_p1: We respect your privacy and have taken measures to protect your data.
terms_section4_p2: Our website is governed by security measures for data transfer and protection.

terms_section5_p1: By submitting your order, you provide personal data voluntarily, which may be processed according to applicable laws.
